name: wordup-awps
description: A boilerplate for Wordpress theme building using wordup and awps theme boilerplate

scripts.install:all: cd wp-content/themes/YOUR_THEME_NAME_HERE/ && composer install && npm install
scripts.git: cd wp-content/themes/ && git clone https://github.com/Alecaddd/awps.git YOUR_THEME_NAME_HERE && cd YOUR_THEME_NAME_HERE && rm .env.example && rm wp-config.sample.php && rm -rf .git && git init
scripts.update:wp: npm run update:env && npm run update:config
scripts.new:git: npm run wordup && npm run git && npm run install:all && npm run update:wp
scripts.new:awps: npm run wordup && npm run awps && npm run install:all && rm wp-config.sample.php
